name: Board Resolution for Major Transaction (Act 992)
description: Formal board resolution authorizing a 'Major Transaction' as required under Section 145 of the Ghana Companies Act, 2019.

clauses.clause_text: BOARD RESOLUTION OF {{company_name}} (the 'Company') HELD ON {{meeting_date}} AT {{meeting_location}}.

WHEREAS the Board has reviewed the proposal for {{transaction_description}} (the 'Transaction'), which involves assets valued at {{asset_value}}, representing approximately {{asset_percentage}}% of the Company's total assets.

IT IS NOTED that as the Transaction constitutes a 'Major Transaction' under Section 145 of the Companies Act, 2019 (Act 992), it is subject to approval by the Shareholders by way of a Special Resolution.

IT IS HEREBY RESOLVED THAT: (1) The Transaction is in the best interest of the Company; (2) Subject to Shareholder approval, the Transaction be and is hereby approved; (3) {{authorized_person_1}} and {{authorized_person_2}} be authorized to execute all necessary documents to give effect to the Transaction.
A General Meeting of the Shareholders be convened on {{general_meeting_date}} to consider and, if thought fit, pass a Special Resolution to approve the Transaction.
